name: Star Wrecker Pre-Demo Demo
description:
Star Wrecker is a simple danmaku shoot-em-up set in a parody sci-fi world.

...Or at least it will be, when it's finished.

In the meantime, please enjoy this short playable prototype.

Hold Z to fire. Shift lets you move slowly. X uses a smart bomb -- if you're hit by an enemy bullet, this can save you if you're fast enough! Press Ctrl to skip the hilarious dialogue.

VERY LATE EDIT: Hey, uh, the actual game's been out for a while now! Get it here: https://mr-frog.itch.io/star-wrecker
